name: Orc Captain
Orc Veteran
Veteran Orc Soldier
Skilled Orc Fighter
desc: The scars accrossed his face from previous battles show that this orc has been living for a long time.
The orc is in a battle stance. It obviously has experience in fighting.
The orc is huge. It is almost as tall as two of you.
itemDrops: You see that the orc you killed had a bag of valuables. Within it you find some iron armor.
You search the $name and find a healing potion.
You search the Orc and find a healing potion.
